org.apache.gearpump.transport

Class Express

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.gearpump.transport.Express
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    akka.actor.Extension, ActorLookupById

    public class Express
extends java.lang.Object
implements akka.actor.Extension, ActorLookupById
    Custom networking layer.

    It will translate long sender/receiver address to shorter ones to reduce the network overhead.
